titleStmt.title: The operator for the teeth shewing how to preserve the teeth and gums from all the accidents they are subject to : with particular directions for childrens teeth : as also the description and use of the polican, never published before / by Charles Allen.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Charles.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham for the author and are to be sold by Robert Thornton and by the author,
